opinion.case_name: Bloomberg, Mayor of the City of New York v. Henrietta D., on Behalf of Themselves and All Others Similarly Situated

opinion:
541 U.S. 936

BLOOMBERG, MAYOR OF THE CITY OF NEW YORK, ET AL.
v.
HENRIETTA D. ET AL., ON BEHALF OF THEMSELVES AND ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED.

1

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 331 F. 3d 261.
